title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits: Special Use Permits or Commercial Use permits may be required for certain activities. More information can be found by selecting the appropriate link below.  Special Use Permits are required for special events such as weddings conducted on park property. Commercial Use Authorizations are required for tour companies, trolley companies, and other specialty tours which earn a profit from bringing groups to, or conducting tours of the park.     Â    Fort Frederica has much to offer tour groups, including:  A 23 minute park film Self guided explorations: with or without complimentary audio tour Museum area with artifacts Ranger Led Tours/Programs need to be scheduled at least two weeks in advance    Reservations: Please call: (912) 638-3639 on weekdays 9:00 am - 4:30 pm. Reserved times for programs are made on a first-come basis. Large groups will be split to accommodate auditorium fire regulations. Groups without reservations will be admitted to the park film as space permits.
